page.title: 04HIGH VALLEYFIELD
page.content: High Valleyfield is a mining village set between the River Forth and the Torryburn Bypass It grew up mainly because of employment at{Valleyfield {Pit.}This was closed in 1978 and since that time, although some are employed in other pits in the area, unemployment is high. There are plenty of amenities in the village. It serves the surrounding villages in many ways. There is a {Health Centre}with four doctors and a} dentist, a{Youth and Community Centre open seven days a week and the{Burns {Street Community Offices,}where villagers can go for general information on Welfare Rights, general advice on who to contact about a particular problem/housing advice,help for the disabled and the elderly.
